name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **Fastify**, and **PostgreSQL** to build high-performance backend solutions. I possess in-depth knowledge in CI/CD automation and containerization with **Docker** and **Terraform**, ensuring seamless deployment and scalability of applications. My technical acumen extends to integrating machine learning models and leveraging libraries such as **Pandas** and **Polars** for data manipulation, enhancing data processing efficiency.

Experienced in developing reusable components and APIs with **React** and **Next.js**, I also prioritize system reliability and performance through techniques like A/B testing. Previously, I successfully led enterprise-grade platform development, showcasing my ability to apply cutting-edge technologies while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My multifaceted expertise ensures the delivery of secure, robust applications that meet the demanding needs of the healthcare and financial sectors.
